title: Glenn Gabe – Semrush profileAuthor Photo
description: Semrush's digital marketing blog is an innovative resource for content strategy, content marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, social media and more.
content: Google’s New Page Experience Signal: An Object-Oriented Approach to UX Ranking Factors, But Will It Have...Google announced the Page Experience signal, which will be a new ranking factor rolling out in May 2021. It combines multiple sub-signals into one larger signal. This guide will break down Google’s object-oriented approach and the factors involved.Industry NewsNov 10, 2020Bang Your Head — 7 Types of Aggressive Advertising from Sites Negatively Impacted by Google Quality UpdatesThe impact of disruptive and aggressive advertising is an important topic that site owners need to thoroughly understand. Glenn Gabe of GSQi explains 7 types of aggressive advertising he has seen on sites that have been negatively impacted by Google‘s quality updates.Industry NewsJun 13, 2017
